title: Артист с большой дороги
overview: A recidivist thief named the Artist is released from prison after a third term. He decides to give up his criminal past, but for this he needs to get to the loot, which he hid in a hiding place in his house. By this time, the Artist's daughter-in-law and grandchildren live there, and in order to pick up his thieves' trophies, he has to remember his theatrical past and get a job as a nanny to his own grandchildren.
